favourite.article: Amen, Lord we open our whole being and call upon Your name...
Lord, we open our hearts and call on You!!
Amen. Praise the Lord. How sweet You are Lord.
Oh Lord Jesus. If you wish to let Him in just call the name of the One who saves even the lepers.
Amen! You may try clicking on the right side that has "guitar" written and you may see the guitar chords for that hymn. Do so in every hymn. Praise the Lord!
I only just heard this song last week in the young people's meeting and I really enjoyed it. I was wondering if anyone knew the chords so I could practise it on my guitar? Thanks, Grace in Him.
